# AdSec-Grasshopper
![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=125DA9&label=downloads&query=download_count&url=https%3A%2F%2Fyak.rhino3d.com%2Fpackages%2Fadsec&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,) [![Install plugin](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-Food4Rhino-green?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://www.food4rhino.com/en/app/adsec)

AdSec-Grasshopper is a plugin for Grasshopper wrapping Oasys AdSec's .NET API. The plugin allows users of Grasshopper to create, edit and analyse AdSec models seemlesly. 

| Latest | CI Pipeline | Unit Tests | Deployment | Dependencies |

Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.

Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.

## License
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg?&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

The plugin is free to download but can only be loaded with a license for AdSec API available. Contact Oasys for a free trial. For licensing of AdSec refer to Oasys Software licensing terms: https://www.oasys-software.com/support/licensing-of-oasys-software/
